snippet.title: Hot Dish - PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
Although the game does have a Steam release, I decided to try a different PC platform: Big Fish Games. It's a pretty fun game, I won't lie to you.

Hot Dish (C) Ziggurat Interactive
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/12570/Hot_Dish/
Big Fish Games page: https://www.bigfishgames.com/us/en/games/2286/hot-dish/?pc&lang=en
